tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I enrolled for video consultation. Doctor was rude and condescending throughout the entire conversation. My baby had diarrhoea and I mentioned to doctor that It seems like baby has secondary lactose intolerance. Doctor told me to stop breastfeeding and start formula milk. When I mentioned that my baby rejects formula milk, she started saying she can‚Äôt do anything in this. Also she didn‚Äôt even see my baby to check if the baby is active or not**** *** ** ***** *** *** ***** ** *************Doctor needs to have some empathy towards parents.
reply_text:
We regret your poor experience. First there are only 2 options if the baby is 4.5 months old first breast feeds second formula. If the reports show reducing substances positive one has to take lactose free formula. Slowly the babies get used it it. So a doctor cannot ask parents to start complimentary feeding if the baby is not taking formula. Moreover there are many formulas for lactose free babies also but the parents need to be ready. And madam subtle signs of dehydration cannot be seen on video. It was clearly explained to go to hospital for assessment of dehydration. Hygiene has to be taken care of in case of gastroenteritis. Moreover the tests were already done still to confirm u were asked to repeat to confirm again the diagnosis. Parents mustvalso understand the limitations. You have ourself googled everything so u know primary and secondary lactose intolerance then why ask a doctor. 
Best wishes.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were worried about our child health because he had fever but thank God we were recommended to visit Anmol Child Care. We met Dr. Radhika Sachdev she is so friendly. She called us over phone and asked us to come before time of our appointment. Her concern towards patients is  really appreciative. She explained everything about our child'health. She gave an assurance that any time you can call if anything goes wrong with baby and nothing to be worried of and this thing really motivated us as a parents. She not only advised about what food to be given to child but also sent the diet chart for baby on WhatsApp. She is best and I can recommend to everyone.
Excellent care of a child. Very helpful , explain well enough to understand how to take care of a baby.. well satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been seeing Dr Radhika for my kids since last 2 years. *** ** *** **** ************* * **** *** ** **** She spent enough time in understanding the problem and explaining that to us. She never scare parents and provide best solution. She also refers to other centres whenever need arises. I am very thankful to Dr Radhika as she provided solution to my daughters long term sickness for whom I changed almost 4-5 other Doctors before meeting Dr Radhika.

Overall satisfied and highly recommend.

review:
As a parent, finding a pediatrician you trust is paramount, and I couldn't be happier with the care provided by Dr Radhika. From the moment we walked in, the warm and welcoming atmosphere put both my child and me at ease. The staff are incredibly friendly and accommodating.
She always listens attentively to our concerns and provides thorough explanations. Her approach to healthcare is holistic, focusing not only on treating illnesses but also on promoting overall wellness and development. 
It's reassuring to know that my child is in such capable and caring hands.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been associated with the doctor for last 5-6 yrs for both my children. She is an amazing person with all the love  and care with the perfect right treatment for the child. I‚Äôm am more than satisfied and happy to have her as my child specialist.

Dr. Radhika mam this was my last visit to you i visited to you because of your reviews but my experience with you was unfortunate, we as a parent have self respect as well but i think you yourself have some anger issues. You must learn how to be polite with a parent and have a friendly behaviour with 1yr kid. Tone matters a lot doctor.
reply_text:
Regret ur experience. Never remember talking to my little patients like you said nonfriendly. Sad that educated patients don't understand the importance of balanced diet.  They concentrate on bottle feeds and Milk. At 1 year of age a baby requires lot of other things other than milk. Second it is important to take the weight of the child to calculate the dose of the drug and also to see what percentile the baby falls in. So of doing that has hurt ur self respect then I can't help. 
Any way I hope the baby recovers from loose motions and perianal rash and you take care of hygiene and nutrition. Loose motions are always because of breach in hygiene.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Although her clinic is a little far from our place, but still she is my kids pediatrician.Highly recommend her. I thank you with all my heart and wish you all the very best üëçüôÇ

review: First we took video Appoinment on practo and consulted Dr. Radhika at her clinic at night. Our baby was having fever and was in extreme pain due to vaccination we had from govt hospital a day earlier. Doctor described us everything and prescribed medicines and consultation was over. But due to some situation we had to contact Dr. Again and it was late night. It was so nice even after consultation was over, doctor still answered us on the phone from her home and responded all our messages on whatsapp till 1am at night for our baby's medicines and correct dosage. A week after, we visited doctor at clinic and doctor's behavior was wonderful. We consulted other doctors as well but I personally recommend her to every person who cares for their kids because this doctor has very deep knowledge about child issues.

review: we have visited Delhi last week and suddenly my 8 MO. baby fall ill,  he was suffering from fever at time we booked appointment with Dr Radhika. she is such a gem for all mommies there,  she is so polite,  humble and a very good listener. My son has high temp, without any delay she first started the treatment and gave her personal number to get in contact if needed.  At time of visit there was a issue happened with online payments,  but Dr Radhika and her staff (Yogesh) none of them forced us for payments. it makes us clear that Dr Radhika is not just as we saw other docs. she has provided full diet chart,  and satisfied treatment to my son. thank you Dr for being there for us
